mutants.original_line: return ''.join(char if char.isalnum() else character for char in string)
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((char if char.isalnum() else character for char in string))
mutants.code:
def replace_non_alphanumeric(string, character):
    return 'MUTATED'.join((char if char.isalnum() else character for char in string))
